analysis_summary.main_finding: The chamds.com website is no longer an active e-commerce site. It serves as a landing page that redirects users to two Naver Smart Store locations.
analysis_summary.business_model: Redirects to external Naver Smart Store platforms

technical_details.cafe24_structure: Legacy Cafe24 platform structure present but no active products
technical_details.navigation: No category navigation or product links found
technical_details.homepage_content: Simple landing page with two redirect buttons

scraping_results.reason_for_zero_products: Site redirects to external Naver Smart Store platforms

recommendation.action: Cannot scrape products from chamds.com as requested
recommendation.alternative: Products are available on the Naver Smart Store platforms, but those would require different scraping approaches and may have terms of service restrictions

verification_attempts: Searched for category pages and navigation links
Tested common Cafe24 category URL patterns
Examined homepage structure and all available links
Confirmed site serves only as redirect landing page
